Text: Thank you very much for this post. It's an excellent film series of a classic literary series. I have it on the bookshelf next to it's 'companion series', Patrick Obrians' Jack Aubrey series. Been downloading for 4 days now. Any way you can up the seed for maybe 24 hrs.? It would be very much apppreciated. Thanks again.
Thanks to the very generous seeder who allowed me to get this and the other Sharpe episodes yesterday and today. Huzzay to you and Sharpe!
